oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Federal regulation of drugs administered through feed
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Graber, George
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Antibiotics
Feed additives
Legislation
medicated feeds
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: It is a pleasure for me to be part of this program on nutrition and nutritional diseases in food animals. Although my formal education was in animal nutrition, it has been very difficult to keep up with new advances. In fact, it has been difficult to maintain a working knowledge in amino acid nutrition, an area I spent many years researching. Therefore, I intend to listen attentively to what is said by others from this podium.
